00003 /* Trace Stack -- A stack for traced closures that need to be assigned end-times. */
00004 
00005 #ifndef __SLIME_CLOSURESTK__
00006 #define __SLIME_CLOSURESTK__
00007 
00008 #include <stdint.h>
00009 
00010 /* -- Forward-declare some types: */
00011 
00012 typedef struct closurestk_s closurestk_t;
00013 typedef struct closurestk_chunk_s closurestk_chunk_t;
00014 typedef struct closurestk_chunk_hdr_s closurestk_chunk_hdr_t;
00015 
00016 struct closurestk_s {
00017   closurestk_chunk_t* nonempty;
00018   closurestk_chunk_t* allempty;
00019 };
00020 
00021 struct closurestk_chunk_hdr_s {
00022   closurestk_chunk_t* tail;
00023   uintptr_t num;  
00024 };
00025 
00026 /* -- The rest depends on closure_t (from "closure.h") */
00027 #include "closure.h"
00028 
00029 closurestk_t* closurestk_init(closurestk_t* closurestk);
00030 closure_t* closurestk_push(closurestk_t* closurestk, closure_t* closure);
00031 closure_t* closurestk_pop(closurestk_t* closurestk);
00032 
00033 #define CHUNK_SIZE ((4096 - sizeof(closurestk_chunk_hdr_t)) / sizeof(closure_t*))
00034 
00035 struct closurestk_chunk_s {
00036   closurestk_chunk_hdr_t hdr;
00037   closure_t* objs[CHUNK_SIZE];
00038 };
00039 
00040 #endif
